```{r}
# First Moment
library(spatstat)
library(readxl)
library(sp)
library(sf)
library(raster)

df<- read_excel("../data/fir_coordinates.xlsx")
window <- DATA$Window
elevation <- DATA$Elevation
forest <- DATA$Forest
HFI <- DATA$HFI
dist_water <- DATA$Dist_Water

sf_object <- st_as_sf(window)
window_owin <- as.owin(sf::st_geometry(sf_object))
# Create the ppp object
fir_ppp <- ppp(x = df$X, y = df$Y, window = window_owin)

#Load in and plot the Finnish data(finpines); 
plot(fir_ppp)
str(DATA)
```
